name: Hermit's Many Houses
description:
Made at Global Game Jam 2019 @ Werk1: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/jam-sites/ggj-werk1

Check out the games page: https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/hermits-many-houses

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Our goal was to create a game without conventional video game tropes like highscores, clearly defined goals etc. The player simply inhabits the character of a hermit crab on the beach of a pacific island and is free to explore and find the most interesting home for the little animal. In order to spice things up, seaguls are lerking predators above the coastline. Hide from them or run when they dive for the kill!
